channel.title: RuneAgain PVP - World 2
channel.description:
[CENTER]We have recently opened up World 2 of our server for the PVP side of our game. This is supported using the multiple worlds, and players can interact using the clan-chat. You can also change to the Economy side of the game using the world menu.
Website: [URL=http://runeagain.com]Click Here[/URL] Client Download: [URL=http://runeagain.com/play/RuneAgain-World2.jar]Click Here[/URL]
Features: - PK Point System - Shops
[img]http://i.imgur.com/MzzfZoJ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/JVysonQ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/62NmOWI.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/bWbpLNn.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/U0RcMGL.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/T9P5bez.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/cEeUHF8.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/9z6J81q.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NBwImnn.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/YUuayVT.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/U1pEI3r.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/nys9Da4.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/RHntX9c.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Z52kHNh.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/XwuCjoG.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/xHnhwTJ.png[/img]
[/CENTER]

item.title: RuneAgain PVP - World 2
item.dc:creator: @Mezzyscape562 Mezzyscape562
item.description:
@Mezzyscape562 wrote:

prothieum:

Yeah host Arios and just change the name, smart thinking.

Fix World System, add highscores, voting system, donation system, fix exploits, have webclient ready, fix cache problems, remove VinTheTrader exploit. Yep, just changing the name.
